snippet: Two men on a motorcycle on Monday fatally shot a local politician from the ruling party of Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Uttar Pradesh, the second such killing in a week.
abstract: Two assailants on a motorcycle shoot and kill Omveer Singh, local Indian politician from the ruling party of Prime Min Narendra Modi; it is unclear whether murder is connected to killing of fellow politician Vijay Pandit three days earlier.
lead_paragraph: Two men on a motorcycle on Monday fatally shot a local politician from the ruling party of Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Uttar Pradesh, the second such killing in a week.
